title: INST Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Project Research Scientist II Posts
description: The Institute of Nano Science and Technology (INST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Research Scientist II Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their post-graduation and Ph.D. can apply for the INST Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, se...
